mapper.select: select a.survey_no, a.survey_contents, b.email, a.total_score, a.reg_date, a.limit_time, a.status, a.reported_cnt from TB_SURVEY a, TB_MEMBER b where a.mber_no = b.mber_no;

select a.survey_contents, b.item_contents, c.email, d.reg_date, a.survey_no from TB_SURVEY a, TB_SURVEY_ITEM b, TB_MEMBER c, TB_VOTE d where a.survey_no = d.survey_no and d.item_no = b.item_no and a.survey_no = b.survey_no and d.mber_no = c.mber_no;

select a.survey_no, a.survey_contents, b.email, a.total_score, a.reg_date, a.limit_time, a.status, a.reported_cnt from TB_SURVEY a, TB_MEMBER b where a.survey_no = #{survey_no} and a.mber_no = b.mber_no;
mapper.update: update TB_SURVEY SET status = 'SS02' ,reported_cnt = reported_cnt+1 WHERE survey_no = #{survey_no};
